00007    void BmlSlowRunDataBlock::setTypes() {
00008     //define the doubles
00009     _theDblTypes.clear();
00010     _theDblTypes["SEXTAPOLECURRENTS"] = std::make_pair<int, std::vector<double>* > (kIntBmlSroRunPosSextCur, &_sextapoleCurrents);
00011     _theDblTypes["BENDCURRENTS"] = std::make_pair<int, std::vector<double>* > (kIntBmlSroRunPosBendCur, &_bendCurrents);
00012     _theDblTypes["COLLIMATORPOSITIONS"]  = std::make_pair<int, std::vector<double>* > (kIntBmlSroRunPosColPos, &_colPositions);
00013     _theDblTypes["QUADRUPOLECURRENTS"] = std::make_pair<int, std::vector<double>* > (kIntBmlSroRunPosQuadCur, &_quadrupoleCurrents);
00014     _theDblTypes["TRIMCURRENTS"] = std::make_pair<int, std::vector<double>* > (kIntBmlSroRunPosTrimCur, &_trimCurrents);
00015 
00016     //define the ints 
00017     _theIntTypes.clear();
00018     _theIntTypes["H6AEXPERIMENTCOUNT"] = std::make_pair<int, std::vector<int>* > (kIntBmlSroRunPosH6aExpCount, &_h6aExpCounts);
00019     _theIntTypes["H6BEXPERIMENTCOUNT"] = std::make_pair<int, std::vector<int>* > (kIntBmlSroRunPosH6bExpCount, &_h6bExpCounts);
00020     _theIntTypes["H6CEXPERIMENTCOUNT"]  = std::make_pair<int, std::vector<int>* > (kIntBmlSroRunPosH6cExpCount, &_h6cExpCounts);
00021     _theIntTypes["RPEXPERIMENTCOUNT"] = std::make_pair<int, std::vector<int>* > (kIntBmlSroRunPosRpExpCount, &_rpExpCounts);
00022     _theIntTypes["SCINTILLATORCOUNT"] = std::make_pair<int, std::vector<int>* > (kIntBmlSroRunPosScintCount, &_scintCounts);
00023 
00024 
00025     //define the floats
00026     _theFloatTypes.clear();
00027 
00028   }

00031   void BmlSlowRunDataBlock::setDblArrays(const DaqTypeDataDblMap_t& daqTypeDataDblMap) 
00032   {
00033         //the position variable
00034     int ipos(kIntBmlSroRunDblValues);
00035     //Loop over the vector with the defined types
00036     for ( BmlSroTypesDblMap_t::iterator types_iter = _theDblTypes.begin(); types_iter != _theDblTypes.end(); types_iter++) {
00037       //std::cout << "Type: " << (*types_iter).first << std::endl;
00038       //Extract this type from the map (if possible)
00039       DaqTypeDataDblMap_t::const_iterator slowmap_iter = daqTypeDataDblMap.find((*types_iter).first); 
00040       if( slowmap_iter != daqTypeDataDblMap.end() )
00041         {
00042           //Set the position and the size of this datatype
00043           setNumPos( (*types_iter).second.first, ipos , static_cast<int> ((*slowmap_iter).second.size())); 
00044           for(std::vector<double>::const_iterator thevals_iter =
00045                 (*slowmap_iter).second.begin(); thevals_iter != (*slowmap_iter).second.end(); thevals_iter++ ){
00046             //std::cout << "Value: " << (*thevals_iter) << std::endl;
00047             obj()->setDoubleVal(ipos, (*thevals_iter));
00048             ipos++;
00049           }  
00050           
00051         } else std::cout << "Type " << (*types_iter).first <<" not known" << std::endl;
00052     }
00053   }

00056   void BmlSlowRunDataBlock::setIntArrays(const DaqTypeDataUIntMap_t& daqTypeDataUIntMap) 
00057   {
00058     //the position variable
00059     int ipos(kIntBmlSroRunIntValues+1);
00060     //Loop over the vector with the defined types
00061     for ( BmlSroTypesIntMap_t::iterator types_iter = _theIntTypes.begin(); types_iter != _theIntTypes.end(); types_iter++) {
00062       //Extract this type from the map (if possible)
00063       //std::cout << "Type: " << (*types_iter).first << std::endl;
00064       DaqTypeDataUIntMap_t::const_iterator slowmap_iter = daqTypeDataUIntMap.find((*types_iter).first); 
00065       if( slowmap_iter != daqTypeDataUIntMap.end() )
00066         {
00067           //Set the position and the size of this datatype
00068           setNumPos( (*types_iter).second.first, ipos , static_cast<int> ((*slowmap_iter).second.size())); 
00069           for(std::vector<unsigned int>::const_iterator thevals_iter =
00070                 (*slowmap_iter).second.begin(); thevals_iter != (*slowmap_iter).second.end(); thevals_iter++ ){
00071             obj()->setIntVal(ipos, static_cast<int>((*thevals_iter)));
00072             ipos++;
00073           }  
00074         } else std::cout << "Type " << (*types_iter).first <<" not known" << std::endl;
00075       
00076     }
00077     
00078   }

00109   void BmlSlowRunDataBlock::prepareOutputVecs(){
00110    
00111     //Loop over the types vec for Doubles
00112     for (BmlSroTypesDblMap_t::iterator types_iter = _theDblTypes.begin(); types_iter != _theDblTypes.end(); types_iter++) {
00113 #ifdef CONV_DEBUG
00114       std::cout << "BmlSlowRunDataBlock::prepareOutputVecs Doubles: " << (*types_iter).first << std::endl;
00115       std::cout << "Position in map: " << types_iter->second.first << std::endl;
00116       std::cout << "Position in LCIO::Double Collec: " << getPos(types_iter->second.first) << std::endl;
00117       std::cout << "Number of values: " << getNum(types_iter->second.first) << std::endl;
00118 #endif 
00119       //Retrieve position and number of values and store these in the
00120       //output vectors
00121       //Check first whether this datatype has been written at all
00122       int pos(getPos( types_iter->second.first));
00123       int numvals(getNum(types_iter->second.first));
00124       if(pos > -1){
00125         for(int ivals = pos; ivals < pos+numvals;ivals++)
00126           types_iter->second.second->push_back(getDoubleVal(ivals));
00127       } else std::cout << "Nothing found for Type: " << (*types_iter).first<< std::endl;
00128         
00129     }
00130     
00131 
00132     //Loop over the types vec Ints
00133     for (BmlSroTypesIntMap_t::iterator types_iter =
00134     _theIntTypes.begin(); types_iter != _theIntTypes.end(); types_iter++) {
00135 #ifdef CONV_DEBUG
00136       std::cout << "BmlSlowRunDataBlock::prepareOutputVecs Ints: " << (*types_iter).first << std::endl;
00137       std::cout << "Position in map: " << types_iter->second.first << std::endl;
00138       std::cout << "Position in LCIO::Int Collec: " << getPos(types_iter->second.first) << std::endl;
00139       std::cout << "Number of values: " << getNum(types_iter->second.first) << std::endl;
00140 #endif 
00141       //Retrieve position and number of values and store these in the
00142       //output vectors
00143       //Check first whether this datatype has been written at all
00144       int pos(getPos( types_iter->second.first));
00145       int numvals(getNum(types_iter->second.first));
00146       if(pos > -1){
00147         for(int ivals = pos; ivals < pos+numvals;ivals++) types_iter->second.second->push_back(getIntVal(ivals));
00148       } else std::cout << "Nothing found for Type: " << (*types_iter).first<< std::endl;
00149     }
00150 
00151     //Loop over the types vec Floats
00152     for (BmlSroTypesFloatMap_t::iterator types_iter = _theFloatTypes.begin(); types_iter != _theFloatTypes.end(); types_iter++) {
00153 #ifdef CONV_DEBUG
00154       std::cout << "BmlSlowRunDataBlock::prepareOutputVecs Floats: " << (*types_iter).first << std::endl;
00155       std::cout << "Position in map: " << types_iter->second.first << std::endl;
00156       std::cout << "Position in LCIO::Double Collec: " << getPos(types_iter->second.first) << std::endl;
00157       std::cout << "Number of values: " << getNum(types_iter->second.first) << std::endl;
00158 #endif 
00159       //Retrieve position and number of values and store it in the
00160       //output vectors
00161       //Check first whether this datatype has been written at all
00162       int pos(getPos( types_iter->second.first));
00163       int numvals(getNum(types_iter->second.first));
00164       if(pos > -1){
00165         for(int ivals = pos; ivals < pos+numvals; ivals++)
00166           types_iter->second.second->push_back(getFloatVal(ivals));
00167       } else std::cout << "Nothing found for Type: " << (*types_iter).first<< std::endl;
00168     }
00169 
00170 
00171     
00172   }

00177   void BmlSlowRunDataBlock::print(std::ostream& os) {
00178     //prepare the results
00179     prepareOutputVecs();    
00180     os << "BmlSlow Run Data" << std::endl;
00181     os << "Time Stamp:       " << getTimeStamp().getDateString() <<" h"  << std::endl;
00182     os << "AbsorberPosition: " << getAbsorberPosition() << " mm" << std::endl;
00183     os << "T4Position:       " << getT4Position() << " mm" << std::endl;
00184     os << "TargetPosition:   " << getTargetPosition() << " mm" << std::endl;
00185 
00186     os << "*** Sextapole Magnets Current: ***" << std::endl; 
00187     unsigned int idev(0);
00188     std::vector<double> sextapoleCurrents(getSextapoleCurrents());
00189     for(unsigned int isextcurs = 0; isextcurs < sextapoleCurrents.size()-1; isextcurs+=2) {
00190       os << "Sextapole Magnets Current[" << idev+1 << "] - Measurement:  " << sextapoleCurrents[isextcurs]  << " A" << std::endl;
00191       os << "Sextapole Magnets Current[" << idev+1 << "] - Reference:    " << sextapoleCurrents[isextcurs+1]  << " A" << std::endl;
00192       idev++;
00193     }
00194 
00195 
00196     os << "*** Bending Magnets Current: ***" << std::endl; 
00197     idev=0;
00198     std::vector<double> bendCurrents(getBendCurrents());
00199     for(unsigned int ibendcurs = 0; ibendcurs < bendCurrents.size()-1; ibendcurs+=2) {
00200       os << "Bending Magnets Current["  << idev+1 << "] - Measurement:  " << bendCurrents[ibendcurs]  << " A" << std::endl;
00201       os << "Bending Magnets Current["  << idev+1 << "] - Reference:    " << bendCurrents[ibendcurs+1]  << " A" << std::endl;
00202       idev++;
00203     }
00204 
00205     os << "*** Quadupole Magnets Current: ***" << std::endl; 
00206     idev=0;
00207     std::vector<double> quadCurrents(getQuadrupoleCurrents());
00208     for(unsigned int iquadcurs = 0; iquadcurs < quadCurrents.size()-1; iquadcurs+=2) {
00209       os << "Quadrupole Magnets Current["  << idev+1 << "] - Measurement:  " << quadCurrents[iquadcurs]  << " A" << std::endl;
00210       os << "Quadrupole Magnets Current["  << idev+1 << "] - Reference:    " << quadCurrents[iquadcurs+1]  << " A" << std::endl;
00211       idev++;
00212     }
00213 
00214     os << "*** Trim Magnets Current: ***" << std::endl; 
00215     idev=0;
00216     std::vector<double> trimCurrents(getTrimCurrents());
00217     for(unsigned int itrimcurs = 0; itrimcurs < trimCurrents.size()-1; itrimcurs+=2) {
00218       os << "Trim Magnets Current["  << idev+1 << "] - Measurement:  " << trimCurrents[itrimcurs]  << " A" << std::endl;
00219       os << "Trim Magnets Current["  << idev+1 << "] - Reference:    " << trimCurrents[itrimcurs+1] << " A"  << std::endl;
00220       idev++;
00221     }
00222 
00223     os << "*** Collimator Settings: ***" << std::endl; 
00224     idev=0;
00225     std::vector<double> colPositions(getCollimatorPositions());
00226     for(unsigned int icolpos = 0; icolpos < colPositions.size()-3; icolpos+=4) {
00227       os << "Collimator Position x["  << idev+1 << "] - Measurement:  " << colPositions[icolpos]  << " mm" << std::endl;
00228       os << "Collimator Position x["  << idev+1 << "] - Reference:    " << colPositions[icolpos+1] << " mm"  << std::endl;
00229       os << "Collimator Position y["  << idev+1 << "] - Measurement:  " << colPositions[icolpos+2] << " mm" << std::endl;
00230       os << "Collimator Position y["  << idev+1 << "] - Reference:    " << colPositions[icolpos+3] << " mm"  << std::endl;
00231       idev++;
00232     }
00233 
00234 
00235     os << "*** H6A Experiment Count: ***" << std::endl; 
00236     //Print the h6a experiment count
00237     int ih6aexpcounts(0);
00238     std::vector<int> h6aExpCounts(getH6aExperimentCounts());
00239     for(std::vector<int>::iterator vec_iter = h6aExpCounts.begin(); vec_iter !=
00240           h6aExpCounts.end(); vec_iter++) {
00241       if(ih6aexpcounts < 4 ) os << "H6A Experiment Count [" << ih6aexpcounts+1 << "]: " << (*vec_iter) << " Counts" << std::endl;
00242       if(ih6aexpcounts > 3)  os << "H6A Experiment Count UNKNOWN TYPE [" << ih6aexpcounts+1 << "]: " << (*vec_iter) << " Counts" << std::endl;
00243       ih6aexpcounts++;
00244     }
00245 
00246 
00247     os << "*** H6B Experiment Counts: ***" << std::endl; 
00248     //Print the h6b experiment counts
00249     int ih6bexpcounts(0);
00250     std::vector<int> h6bExpCounts(getH6bExperimentCounts());
00251     for(std::vector<int>::iterator vec_iter = h6bExpCounts.begin(); vec_iter !=
00252           h6bExpCounts.end(); vec_iter++) {
00253       if(ih6bexpcounts < 4 ) os << "H6B Experiment Count [" << ih6bexpcounts+1 << "]: " << (*vec_iter) << " Counts" << std::endl;
00254       if(ih6bexpcounts > 3)  os << "H6B Experiment Count UNKNOWN TYPE [" << ih6bexpcounts+1 << "]: " << (*vec_iter) << " Counts" << std::endl;
00255       ih6bexpcounts++;
00256     }
00257 
00258 
00259     os << "*** H6C Experiment Counts: ***" << std::endl; 
00260     //Print the h6c experiment counts
00261     int ih6cexpcounts(0);
00262     std::vector<int> h6cExpCounts(getH6cExperimentCounts());
00263     for(std::vector<int>::iterator vec_iter = h6cExpCounts.begin(); vec_iter !=
00264           h6cExpCounts.end(); vec_iter++) {
00265       if(ih6cexpcounts < 4 ) os << "H6B Experiment Count [" << ih6cexpcounts+1 << "]: " << (*vec_iter) << " Counts" << std::endl;
00266       if(ih6cexpcounts > 3)  os << "H6B Experiment Count UNKNOWN TYPE [" << ih6cexpcounts+1 << "]: " << (*vec_iter) << " Counts" << std::endl;
00267       ih6cexpcounts++;
00268     }
00269 
00270     os << "*** RP Experiment Counts: ***" << std::endl; 
00271     //Print the rp experiment counts
00272     int irpexpcounts(0);
00273     std::vector<int> rpExpCounts(getRpExperimentCounts());
00274     for(std::vector<int>::iterator vec_iter = rpExpCounts.begin(); vec_iter !=
00275           rpExpCounts.end(); vec_iter++) {
00276       if(irpexpcounts < 8 ) os << "RP Experiment Count [" << irpexpcounts+1 << "]: " << (*vec_iter) << " Counts" << std::endl;
00277       if(irpexpcounts > 7)  os << "RP Experiment Count UNKNOWN TYPE [" << irpexpcounts+1 << "]: " << (*vec_iter) << " Counts" << std::endl;
00278       irpexpcounts++;
00279     }
00280 
00281     os << "*** Scintillator Counts: ***" << std::endl; 
00282     //Print the scintillator counts
00283     int iscintcounts(0);
00284     std::vector<int> scintCounts(getScintillatorCounts());
00285     for(std::vector<int>::iterator vec_iter = scintCounts.begin(); vec_iter !=
00286           scintCounts.end(); vec_iter++) {
00287       if(iscintcounts < 9 ) os << "Scintillator Counter [" << iscintcounts+1 << "]: " << (*vec_iter) << std::endl;
00288       if(iscintcounts > 8)  os << "Scintillator Counter UNKNOWN TYPE [" << iscintcounts+1 << "]: " << (*vec_iter) << std::endl;
00289       iscintcounts++;
00290     }
